text.div: This profile constrains the Coverage resource for carrying the pharmacy benefit information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process

name: CarinRtpbcRequestCoverageIdentifiers
title: CARIN RTPBC Request Coverage Identifiers
description: This profile constrains the Coverage resource for carrying the pharmacy benefit information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process

element.label: Health Plan Cardholder ID
element.comment: Either *PBM Member ID* (.class.type = 'rxid') or *Subscriber ID* must be populated

element.label: Pharmacy coverage identifiers

slicing.description: The value of the .type element indicates the type of coverage identifier  (rxbin=IIN (BIN), rxpcn=PCN, group=Group ID, rxid=PBM Member ID)

element.definition: Identifiers used by the payer/PBM to located the patient's coverage. IIN (BIN) number, Processor Control Number (PCN), pharmacy benefit Group ID and patient's PBM Member ID
element.comment: Populate with identifiers retrieved from an eligibility service or other source agreed between trading partners

element.label: IIN (BIN) number
element.comment: Populate as agreed between trading partners

element.label: Processor Control Number (PCN)
element.comment: Populate as agreed between trading partners

element.label: Pharmacy Benefit Group ID
element.definition: The patient's Group ID associated with their pharmacy benefit
element.comment: Populate as agreed between trading partners

element.label: PBM Member ID
element.definition: The patient's pharmacy benefit member ID (which may differ from their overall health insurance ID)
element.comment: Populate as agreed between trading partners

element.label: Payer ID
element.definition: Payer ID as defined in the participants' environment. E.g., an identifier defined in an eligibility service to represent the payer.
